header.content:
Together with people who love webtoons and contents.
K-Webtoon is at the center of success track of the future.

1.title: BEYOND WEBTOON
1.subTitle: We work with webtoon lovers.
1.content: Our webtoon illustrators, producers, and story writers discuss and work together to create webtoon contents based on its original story.

2.title: BEYOND BORDERS
2.subTitle: Together, we create contents that transcends boundaries.
2.content: We understand that there are countless talented writers and illustrators from each corner of the world. We are searching for these talented people who can work together with us in making webtoons without putting limits to regional boundaries.

3.title: BEYOND FUTURE
3.subTitle: We know the value of the contents that will become important in the future.
3.content: he number of webtoon readers continue to increase and we will lead the webtoon production projects and create works that can make readers both cry and laugh.

mainText.title: WE ARE IDEACONCERT
mainText.content: We are a company that innovates webtoons and technologies that will lead the future under the slogan 'Always Joyful Imagination.'
mainText.subContent:
IDEACONCERT means that people's various ideas and thoughts come together to create fun at a concert stage.
'Akon', the white mice, and 'Noran', the yellow chick, are characters of IDEACONCERT that like to draw and eat ssweet snacks.

topTitWrap.title: Worrying only prevent opportunities!
topTitWrap.content: Idea Concert is now recruiting webtoon writers! Join us so to make a great webtoons together.

infoTxtBox.content: The workflow goes as follow: Storyboard adaptation - Sketching - Line Drawing - Coloring and Editing - Backgroundwork.

recruitmentPositionWrap.title: Job Openings
recruitmentPositionWrap.content: We encourage for those wo have the capabilities in doing sketching, and coloring and editing, to apply.

1.title: Sketching(Sketch Adaptation)
1.content:
Storyboard Adaptations are then made into Sketch works.
We are looking for people who can do Sketch works based on Ideaconcert's storyboards.

2.title: Line drawing
2.content:
This is the job task turning Sketches into Line Drawing
This is the job task that embodies each character's charm and expressions through the thickness and thinness of the pen lines.

3.title: Coloring and Editing
3.content:
This is the job task of Coloring on Line drawings.
This tasks include applying vivid colors on to the line drawings.

4.title: Background Art
4.content:
This is the job task of Webtoon Background Work.
This is the part where colors are matched and basic backgrounds that are not well expressed or does not suit the atmosphere of the story are edited.

topTitWrap.title: Application Procedures
topTitWrap.content: Idea Concert is now recruiting webtoon writers! Join us so to make a great webtoons together.
topTitWrap.notice: Before applying, please check the application area.

apply.inputGroupTitle: Fill out the application form (columns with '*' marks are required)

position.title: Position (You may choose more than one)

engName.title: English Name
engName.placeHolder: Please fill in your English name

genre.title: Preferred Genre (You may choose more than one)

content.1: Please attach a portfolio of pictures suitable for the position you are applying for.
content.2: Please compress the portfolio into one folder with jpg, png, and pdf files and attach it. Maximum capacity is within 100mb.

apply.agree: I agree to the collection and use of personal information as mentioned above.

topTitWrap.title: View My Application
topTitWrap.content: You may check the status of your application by inserting your email and name used in your application form.

topTitWrap.title: QnA
topTitWrap.content: These are the frequently asked questions. Please refer to it when applying.

question.work: What kind of work will you do at the company?
question.applicationDocuments: What are the documents needed to apply?
question.process: What is the overall recruitment process?
question.to: Is there a TO of the position I'm applying for?
question.result: When can I know the results of the application?
question.reApplycation: Can I apply again even if I have a history of failing?
question.movePart: Is it possible to move to another field after joining the company?
question.feedback: Can I get feedback on the screening after being rejected?

answer.work:
We specialize in making webtoons. We recruit people who can produce Korean webtoons.
There are different fields in producing a webtoon: draft story, line drawings, color and editing, and background art. We encourage anyone who are confident in their drawings and understand the field to apply.

Document Submission> 1st Document Screening> 2nd In-person Practical Test> 3rd In-person Interview> Contract Offer> Final Acceptance and Enter Company. 
(In cases where additional phone interview is needed, we will inform you the details by contacting you individually.)
answer.applicationDocuments:
Documents to submit are CV, cover letter, and most importantly portfolio.
Please include your photo, date of birth, and school details in your CV. You may use a normal CV template.

With regard to the cover letter, please write your motivation of making webtoons, how you studied and explain parts that you excel. In addition, identify the specific job you want to do in the future.

The most important document, your portfolio. Currently our company employs people who does draft story, line drawings, color and editing, and background art.

You can make a photo of what you can do well and submit it.
Please submit at least 10 images in PDF or PPT so that the images can be seen well. You can submit it with just an image. You have to submit only the ones you drew yourself.
answer.process:
Document reception > 1st document screening > 2nd in-house visit practical test > 3rd face-to-face interview > salary condition consultation > Final acceptance and joining the company.
 (There may be additional screenings such as phone calls or video interviews, so we will inform you of the details by contacting you individually when applying.)
answer.to: Most of the positions do not have a TO and are always hiring. If you are suitable for our company, we are actively inviting you, so please apply a lot.
answer.result:
It usually takes two to three weeks, and we don't contact you separately if you fail.
We would like to inform you that the time required may be delayed depending on internal circumstances as we carefully examine whether the team is suitable for the team.
answer.reApplycation: Other positions are possible, but please understand that in the same position, you have to reapply after 6 months at the time of application to review the documents.
answer.movePart: We can work together and move to a part that suits your aptitude and skills.
answer.feedback: Please understand that feedback on the application results is unfortunately not possible.
answer.link: Please check the link below for details.

modal.title: Cancel Application
modal.content:
If you decide to cancel, all the information inserted will be deleted.
Do you still wish to cancel?

topTitWrap.title: My Application
topTitWrap.content: IDEACONCERT is now recruiting webtoon writers! Join us so to make a great webtoons together.

adminComment.title: Recruiter's Comments
adminComment.default: Sorry, the person in charge hasn't checked your application. We will review and inform you the results as soon as possible.
adminComment.true:
Hello, this is Idea Concert.
This is to inform you that you have been accepted to the Idea Concert. Congratulations on your acceptance.
adminComment.false:
Thank you for attending the interview regarding our recruitment.
Despite your impressive experience and interviews, we inform you that you did not pass the final screening due to more applicants than expected. Unfortunately, we would like to thank you again for your participation in the interview and wish you good results for your future employment.
